hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Barinade#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #6# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Huge Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Heart Container#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Bug Bottle# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Ganon's Castle Boss Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Second Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Boomerang#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Boomerang#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Lens of Truth#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Market Potion Shop#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Huge Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
